definition[0]: someoneâ€™s ultimate aim is their main and most important aim, that they hope to achieve in the future
example[0]: Complete disarmament was the ultimate goal of the conference.
example[1]: Our ultimate objective is to have as many female members of parliament as there are male.
definition[1]: the ultimate result of a long process is what happens at the end of it
example[2]: The ultimate outcome of the experiment cannot be predicted.
example[3]: The ultimate fate of the tribe was even sadder.
example[4]: the ultimate failure of the project
definition[2]: if you have ultimate responsibility for something, you are the person who must make the important final decisions about it
example[5]: The ultimate responsibility for policy lies with the president.
example[6]: The ultimate decision rests with the Public Health Service.
definition[3]: better, bigger, worse etc than all other things or people of the same kind
example[7]: The Rolling Stones are the ultimate rock and roll band.
example[8]: The female nude is surely the ultimate test of artistic skill.
